original_text: And when king David came to Bahurim, behold, thence came out a man of the family of the house of Saul, whose name was Shimei, the son of Gera: he came forth, and cursed still as he came.
korean_text: 다윗 왕이 바후림에 이르매 거기서 사울의 친족 한 사람이 나오니 게라의 아들이요 이름은 시므이라 그가 나오면서 계속하여 저주하고

sentences.original_text: And when king David came to Bahurim
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗 왕이 바후림에 이르렀을 때

sentences.original_text: behold, thence came out a man
of the family of the house of Saul
whose name was Shimei, the son of Gera
and cursed still as he came
